# DISP ASPECT

Choose how High Definition (HD) devices display pictures with an aspect ratio of 3:2 (this option is available only when an HDMI cable is connected).

!Display Aspect Options

## Display Options

- **16:9**: Displays the image so that it fills the screen with its top and bottom cropped out.
- **3:2**: Displays the entire image with black bands at either side.
